attributes.action: Give O.A.P.'S Free heating in the winter months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a travesty of injustice that in a country with the fourth biggest economy in the world that some of our Old Folk are too frightened to turn their  heating on for fear of not being able to pay their bill's. The U.K government is quick to bail out Banking establishment's to the tune of billions of pounds,well lets see them do the job that they are supposed to do and that is to look after the people who elected them.Its about time the politicians realized they are there to serve US! I say free heating for pensioners particularly in the winter months. No More pensioners freezing in there own homes!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
